item.title: Ian add a quote by Bill Hicks
item.description: "Today a young man on acid realized that all matter is merely energy condensed to a slow vibration, that we are all one consciousness experiencing itself subjectively, there is no such thing as death, life is only a dream, and we are the imagination of ourselves. Heres Tom with the Weather." -- Bill Hicks

item.title: Ian add a quote by Arthur Schopenhauer
item.description: "Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see." -- Arthur Schopenhauer

item.title: Ian add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Ian add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ian add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ian add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ian add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ian add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Political language is designed to make lies sound truthful and murder respectable, and to give an appearance of solidity to pure wind. " -- George Orwell

item.title: Ian add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "History will be kind to me for I intend to write it." -- Winston S. Churchill
